hear your voice again could we dim the sun and wonder where we've been maybe you and me so kiss me like you did my heart stopped beating such a softer sin, I'm melting in your eyes I lost my place could stay a while and I'm melting in your eyes like my first time that I caught fire just stay with me lay with me now. Never caught my breath every second I'm without you I'm a mess ever know eachother trust these words are stones why cuts aren't healing learning how to love I'm melting in your eyes I lost my place could stay a while I'm melting in your eyes like my first time that I caught fire just stay with me lay with me now, you can stay and watch me fall and of course I'll ask for help, we could take our heads off lay in bed just make love that's all.

well i pretty much killed mine and haley's friendship the night before last and as horrible as this may sound, I am just fine with that, the hard part is going to be finding new frineds, i have grown away from everyone and it really hurts, im not very good at making new friends and i just lost about 3/4 of the ppl i know. i think im going to be ok... something that has been really bothering me lately is these ppl i miss, i miss lauren, i miss brittany, i miss jaycie, taylor, and i miss SARA, i talked to her last night and it went well, she hates it there and i wish that she could move back here, its so hard without them, we have all grown apart and i have no one to run to, i just want to know that they are there, the last time i talked to haley she told me that the reason all my friends are leaving me is bc i push them away but i dont understand why... im just not sure if i should believe her because now she hates me. well thats all i have to say, mothing is hitting right now except for the fact that i know some friends that are hurting and they wont let me in, they wont talk to me, my dramatic moods are over im tired of trying to be the center of attetion, i realized it was wrong and im sorry, well just so you know i am here for you and i want to help, i love you all........
nothing much to say, i thought it would progress but my life is standing still...

Hey I just wanted you to know that I love you a freakin ton and youre strong enough to pull through all of this with wisdom to help the next person coming down your path. You arent ever alone! Remember: True happiness is felt when we help others. Thats seriously true. When you spend your time helping others and making them smile its really rewarding and fun and makes YOUR heart smile. And I know youre good at it. The happy you IS NOT FAKE. Its just a different part of you. A part of you that you just cant seem to be right now because situations call for the other Aprils gaurds and protections and walls and all that. But dont say youve been fake just because you were happy and bubbly when maybe you didnt really want to be. Thats going to make you feel crappy knowing you were "fake" ... and it isnt true! You were just trying to be positive, you were being strong and trying to change things, you were trying to make them better, and you were trying to make other people happy when you probably werent. And, it made you happier to see them happy... didnt it? Sure it did! Just believe in yourself April. I know I believe in you!

I LOVE YOU!!!!!

-heh you know who

wow they really do care, my friends, ive been trying to get attention in all the wrong ways, ive screwed up so bad, where is my faith and what have i come to? they really did see what i was doing and they knew there was something wrong, damn im coming off of this crazy high and hitting rock bottom, this is the worst feeling ive felt in months, you know you are right it is getting outta hand but i cant do this on my own, ive felt so alone and its killing me, the scars, the tears, where is the faith god help me... yet how can i say that and not get struck for the hypocracy, to half of the ppl that think they know me i seem like a church-going christian girl, the other half doesnt know whether to think that i am stoned, pathetic, desperate or straight up crazy, the truth is no one knows me,sure i will tell a few ppl a secret but no one knows exactly the same stuff, i dont deserve them and ive truly failed this time, im in way above my head and i cant do this anymore, im a liar, a cheater, a hypocrite and im pretty sure that if you asked me my own name that i wouldnt even know anymore, its gone. I owe a huge apology to everyone and i cant do this to these ppl that love me anymore, when im mad i do things to scare them, when im hurt i push them away from me, when im scared i deny everything that they ask about, when im trying to be positive i overexagerate to get attention, i want to show them who the real me is but the truth is that i have no clue who that could be, who am i and why have i done this? i need serious help. i dont know where to start and i need a way. someone help me, i know i cant do it on my own...

I really like being able to make it look like everything is ok all day and then i can just let it all out on this little thing.

So if you are reading this you probably have no clue about what I am about to talk about, but two of you do and lets keep it down to that small number of people...
recently she left me shes gone and now im empty, shes far away and cant come back shes the one last piece that i do lack, the counselors tell me to be strong, to know who i am and not be afraid, but thats kind of hard when you are in my position, if i was to say half of the things on my mind id lose you all, though there are only about 15 friends that i can recall ,they have all left me! i know i know, " April, what has happened to the fun-loving,optistic,happy,pretty girl," the truth is that she was never here, she's a freaking mask that i put on to hide the bad,lately more and more of that unmasked person has been showing, the people that say they care about me have faded oh so much, yeah its scary but ive gotten used to being scared, the people that i trust, i try to keep them close because there is no one else there, it hurts so bad and life is so perilous, but I'll just admit it , times like this make realize how much life is full of hate and lust, wow the temptations, i need someone to tell me they love me and tell me its ok, come on i am desperate, i wanna be loved.

I'm becoming less defined as days go by
Fading away (you might say) I'm losing focus
Kind of drifting into the abstract in terms of how I see myself
Sometimes I think I can see right through myself

Less concerned about fitting in to the world
Your world that is, because it doesn't really matter anymore
None of this really matters anymore

Yes I am alone, but then again I always was, as far back as I can tell
I think maybe it's because, because you were never real to begin with
I just made you up to hurt myself, and it worked. Yes it did

There is no you, there is only me
There is no fucking you, there is only me, only

Well the tiniest little dot caught my eye
And it turned out to be a scab
And I had this funny feeling
Like I just knew it's something bad
I just couldn't leave alone

And I kept picking at that scab
Like it was a doorway trying to seal itself shut
But I climbed through

And now I'm somewhere I am not supposed to be
And I can see things I know I really shouldn't see
Now I know why and now I know why
Things aren't as pretty on the inside

There is no fucking you, there is only me, only

Is this really all there is?
Is this really all there is?

I'm okay

I'm not okay
I'm not okay
Well, I'm not okay
I'm not o-fucking-kay
I'm not okay
I'm not okay

okay so this is my first entry britt made me get a lj today bc she was mad that i didnt have one and i dont understand it so im mad at the comp now, its frustrating. i dont really have anything to say but i am ok now, i was happier today than i have been in a really long time. it feels great to be happy again, i missed this and im glad that its back. i feel like a human being again and im ready to take on anything coming my way.
